instructors.name: Alex Chen
instructors.title: Senior Python Developer & AI Instructor
instructors.bio: Alex Chen is a passionate Python expert with 10+ years of software development experience. Specialized in building scalable applications and mentoring developers worldwide. Alex has trained over 50,000 students in Python programming and software architecture.

instructors.name: Dr. Maria Rodriguez
instructors.title: Machine Learning Researcher & Data Science Expert
instructors.bio: Dr. Maria Rodriguez holds a PhD in Computer Science with specialization in Machine Learning. She has published 30+ research papers and worked at leading tech companies. Maria is passionate about making ML accessible to everyone through practical, hands-on education.

instructors.name: Prof. James Wilson
instructors.title: Deep Learning & Neural Networks Specialist
instructors.bio: Prof. James Wilson is a renowned deep learning expert with contributions to major neural network frameworks. He has 15+ years in academia and industry, focusing on computer vision and neural architecture design. James believes in learning through building real-world projects.

instructors.name: Dr. Sarah Patel
instructors.title: Natural Language Processing & LLM Expert
instructors.bio: Dr. Sarah Patel specializes in NLP and Large Language Models with experience at leading AI companies. She has contributed to multiple open-source NLP libraries and is an active researcher in transformer models. Sarah is dedicated to demystifying complex NLP concepts.
